name: Super Spot-Billed Duck Squad
text: When Attacking: Give up to 1 of your active leaders -5000 during this turn. Return this card to your hand at the end of your turn.

effect.text: Give up to 1 of your active leaders -5000 during this turn. Return this card to your hand at the end of your turn.

meta.notes: Rarity is printed as 'C' in a box in the bottom right corner.
